text: Beaivi also called, Beiwe, Bievve, Beivve and Biejje, is the sun goddess in SÃ¡mi mythology. She is the goddess of fertility and sanity. Beivve was often accompanied by her daughter, Beaivi-nieida (the sun maiden) in an enclosure of reindeer antlers. ==Other websites== *December 2003 Holidays- School of Seasons Category:Gods and goddesses
title: Beaivi
